job_purpose: Design, develop, and optimize high-performance telemetry-analytics solutions for mission-critical Defence systems.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design, develop, and optimize C++ modules for data ingestion, processing, and analytics
Implement high-performance, low-latency, scalable data processing pipelines and networking architectures
Build and maintain test suites, continuous integration pipelines, and conduct code reviews
Contribute to architectural decisions in a small, cross-functional team
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Computer Science
10+ years of low-latency, high-performance desktop C++ development
Strong mastery of modern C++ (C++20+) and the STL
Experience with Windows desktop applications using Visual Studio
Solid understanding of multithreading, IPC, and real-time systems
Sound knowledge of object-oriented design principles
preferred_qualifications: Experience with CMake and Ninja build systems
Experience in cross-compilation for Linux targets
Experience in data science and/or machine learning
Experience in refactoring and optimizing existing code
Experience in front-end UI integration in C++
Experience with parallel/GPU compute and 3D engine platforms
Experience in Agile software development and tooling
company_details: A small, Australian-owned company specializing in delivering cutting-edge telemetry-analytics solutions for the Defence sector. The company values speed, modern C++ development, and offers flexible work arrangements either fully remote or from the Sydney office.
